channel.title: CVE Feed for phoeniixx -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for phoeniixx -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-46634|2024-08-28T15:37:40.120Z -- phoeniixx -- custom%20my%20account%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in phoeniixx Custom My Account for Woocommerce allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Custom My Account for Woocommerce: from n/a through 2.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-4552|2024-06-05T17:36:17.249Z -- phoeniixx -- social%20login%20lite%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Social Login Lite For WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 1.6.0. This is due to insufficient verification on the user being supplied during the social login through the plugin. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to log in as any existing user on the site, such as an administrator, if they have access to the email.

item.title: CVE-2024-4552|2024-08-01T20:47:40.047Z -- phoeniixx -- social%20login%20lite%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Social Login Lite For WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 1.6.0. This is due to insufficient verification on the user being supplied during the social login through the plugin. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to log in as any existing user on the site, such as an administrator, if they have access to the email.
